segments.text: Can I help you with something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to cancel one of my accounts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a problem with it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t need it anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you like to do with all the money in this account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just transfer it over to my remaining account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to take any money out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s going to take a moment for me to cancel your account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fine . Take your time .
segments.speaker: S2
